overview: Cyndy Sandor has more than 20 years of senior executive sales and marketing experience in high tech media for consumer and IT industries. An accomplished sales leader and marketing strategist in online media, her expertise in working with top-tier accounts has driven notable revenue growth within the high-tech sector for leading media companies. Her strategic approach to revenue growth is reflected in her work as former President of IDG’s Games Media Group Internet Division; Executive Director, Strategic Accounts, for Ziff Davis Enterprise; Associate Publisher for Jupitermedia’s Developer Network; and Associate Publisher for CMP’s Dr. Dobb’s Journal. Cyndy also had significant impact on profitability and growth as VP of Business Development at RocketCash, now the interactive online promotions division of Coca Cola, and as Promotions Manager at Nike. Cyndy’s favorite activities include spending time with her family (dogs included), youth baseball, running, dance, cooking and computer games.
